Text: zevprogram Second Notice of Availability of Modified Regulatory TextThe Second Notice of Availability of Modified Regulatory Text for the Amendments to the California ZeroEmission Vehicle Regulations is now available at regactzevzevhtm The deadline for public comment is December Best Regards Lisa Kasper You are subscribed to the zevprogram mailing list To UNSUBSCRIBE Please go to the computer which received this email notice From that computer send an email to Please leave the subject line blank In the body of the email please type unsubscribe zevprogram The energy challenge facing California is real Every Californian needs to take immediate action to reduce energy consumption For a list of simple ways you can reduce demand and cut your energy costs see our Website at wwwarbcagov

Re credit earned by postal service vehicleMichael Sorry for my delayed response A postal vehicle would get the same credits as a Ranger EV would get That is Regards Lisa Kasper Taylor Michael E wrote What is the amount of credits earned by a postal service vehicle In Thanks Michael Taylor This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Re credit earned by postal service vehicle Cc Hi Michael I have forwarded your email to Craig Childers who should be able to answer your question Regards Lisa Taylor Michael E wrote Lisa Is there any talk that NEVCOs Gimzo wheel electric vehicle will be allowed to earn ZEV credits in the near future If so when will the date be that they will or were allowed to start earning credits Sincerely Michael Original Message From Lisa Kasper mailto Sent Thursday September PM To Taylor Michael E Subject Re credit earned by postal service vehicle Michael Sorry for my delayed response A postal vehicle would get the same credits as a Ranger EV would get That is Regards Lisa Kasper Taylor Michael E wrote What is the amount of credits earned by a postal service vehicle In Thanks Michael Taylor This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

zevprogram California Fuel Cell Partnership Roundtable DiscussionYou are invited to attend or monitor live via webcast the CaFCP Roundtable discussion on October at am Bringing Fuel Cell Vehicles to Market Scenarios and Challenges with Fuel Alternatives Please visit the ZEV Program web site to download a copy of the invitation located at msprogzevprogzevproghtm You are subscribed to the zevprogram mailing list To UNSUBSCRIBE Please go to the computer which received this email notice From that computer send an email to Please leave the subject line blank In the body of the email please type unsubscribe zevprogram The energy challenge facing California is real Every Californian needs to take immediate action to reduce energy consumption For a list of simple ways you can reduce demand and cut your energy costs see our Website at wwwarbcagov
